DOC.criteria: Age range : 21 year old Body mass index 25.039.9 kg/m2 Weight stable ( < 4.5 kg ( ~10 lbs ) weight gain loss within last 6 month ) Body fat > 25 % ( assessed skinfold plethysmography ( need ) ) Nonsmoking ( within last 6 month ) Constant habitual activity pattern ( within last 3 month ) Clinically normal blood profile ( specifically , normal liver kidney function ; fast blood glucose < 110 mg/dl ) Not take medication know influence appetite metabolism Nondiabetic Age : < 21 year Body mass index : outside 25.039.9 kg/m2 range Gained lose > 4.5 kg ( 10 lb ) within last 6 month Body fat < 25 % assessed plethysmography Smoker ( currently within last 6 month ) Intermittently involve diet and/or exercise program within last 3 month Clinically abnormal blood profile identify study physician , Arthur Rosen , MD Taking medication ( currently within last 3 month ) know influence appetite metabolism Clinically diagnose diabetic Allergies egg Lactose intolerance Clinically diagnose diverticulosis Clinically diagnose diverticulitis
